title: Ventromedial prefrontal cortex stimulation enhances memory and hippocampal neurogenesis in the middle-aged rats

description.text: Ventromedial prefrontal cortex stimulation enhances memory and hippocampal neurogenesis in the middle-aged rats | High-frequency stimulation of the ventromedial prefrontal cortex, which enhances memory and hippocampal neurogenesis, is a novel target for treatment of dementia-related diseases.
